title: Select Wallet Adapter and Contract Type
content: Choose a wallet adapter: **Ethers** (direct provider) or **Web3Auth** (social login). Then choose the type of contract to deploy: **ERC20** (fungible token) or **ERC721** (NFT).

title: Create Wallet
content: Use the selected adapter to create and connect a wallet using the **m3s wallet module**.

title: Fund Wallet with Testnet ETH
content: To deploy a contract, your wallet must have testnet ETH. Visit [Goerli Faucet](https://goerlifaucet.com/) and paste your wallet address to receive funds.

title: Create Smart Contract on SSR. Complete code in /api/sc/compile
content: Generate the Solidity code dynamically based on the contract type selected (ERC20 or ERC721) and input parameters like name, symbol, and supply.

title: Compile Smart Contract on SSR. Complete code in /api/sc/compile
content: Send the Solidity code to the SSR endpoint to compile it using the **m3s smart contract module**. The compiled ABI and bytecode will be returned and stored for deployment.

title: Deploy Smart Contract
content: Deploy a contract using the **m3s smart contract module**, depending on the selected contract type.
